verses.verse: And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H2204>old,<s%> and well <S%H935>stricken<s%> in <S%H3117>age:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> in all <S%H3605>things.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H2205>eldest<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> that <S%H4910>ruled<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had, <S%H7760>Put,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> my thigh: <S%H3409><s%>

And I will make thee <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> unto my <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> dwell: <S%H3427><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H776>country,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H4138>kindred,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> unto my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> me <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> must I needs <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> again <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H834>whence<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H3318>camest?<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H8104>Beware<s%> thou <S%H6435>that<s%> thou <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H853>not<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> again.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> me from my father's <S%H4480>house,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H1><s%> and from the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of my <S%H4138>kindred,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto me, and <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> his <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> unto my <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H4480>thence.<s%> <S%H8033><s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> thee, then thou shalt be <S%H5352>clear<s%> from this my <S%H4480>oath:<s%> <S%H7621><s%> <S%H2063><s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> again.

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3409>thigh<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H113>master,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H1697>matter.<s%>

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1581>camels<s%> of the <S%H4480>camels<s%> <S%H1581><s%> of his <S%H113>master,<s%> and <S%H1980>departed;<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2898>goods<s%> of his <S%H113>master<s%> were in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H763>Mesopotamia,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor.<s%>

And he made his <S%H1581>camels<s%> to kneel <S%H1288>down<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H413>by<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> even the <S%H6256>time<s%> that women go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> water.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> send me good <S%H7136>speed<s%> <S%H6440><s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H5324>stand<s%> here <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5869>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water;<s%> and the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

And let it come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> I shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H413><s%> Let <S%H5186>down<s%> thy <S%H3537>pitcher,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> that I may <S%H8354>drink;<s%> and she shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8354>Drink,<s%> and I will give thy <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H1571>also:<s%> let the same be she that thou hast <S%H3198>appointed<s%> for thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%> and thereby shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>showed<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> my <S%H113>master.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> that, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> came <S%H3318>out,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1328>Bethuel,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> with her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her <S%H7926>shoulder.<s%>

And the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2896>fair<s%> to look <S%H4758>upon,<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> had any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> her: and she went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5869>well,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher,<s%> and came <S%H5927>up.<s%>

And the <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> her, and <S%H559>said,<s%> Let me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H1572>drink<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of thy <S%H4480>pitcher.<s%> <S%H3537><s%>

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8354>Drink,<s%> my <S%H113>lord:<s%> and she <S%H4116>hasted,<s%> and let <S%H3381>down<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and gave him <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

And when she had <S%H3615>done<s%> giving him <S%H8248>drink,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H7579>draw<s%> water for thy <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H518><s%> they have <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H8354>drinking.<s%>

And she <S%H4116>hasted,<s%> and <S%H6168>emptied<s%> her <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8268>trough,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H875>well<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> water, and <S%H7579>drew<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1581>camels.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7583>wondering<s%> at her held his <S%H2790>peace,<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> whether the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had made his <S%H1870>journey<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H1581>camels<s%> had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H8354>drinking,<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earring<s%> of half a <S%H1235>shekel<s%> <S%H4948>weight,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> her <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> shekels <S%H4948>weight<s%> of <S%H2091>gold;<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Whose<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> art <S%H859>thou?<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee:<s%> is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H4725>room<s%> in thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> for us to lodge <S%H3885>in?<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H595>I<s%> am the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> unto <S%H5152>Nahor.<s%>

She <S%H559>said<s%> moreover <S%H413>unto<s%> him, We have <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H4554>provender<s%> <S%H7227>enough,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H4725>room<s%> to lodge <S%H3885>in.<s%>
And the <S%H376>man<s%> bowed down his <S%H6915>head,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> left <S%H5800>destitute<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> of his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and his <S%H571>truth:<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> being in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5148>led<s%> me to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H251>brethren.<s%>
And the <S%H5291>damsel<s%> <S%H7323>ran,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> them of her <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things.<s%>

And <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> had a <S%H251>brother,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3837>Laban:<s%> and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5869>well.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5141>earring<s%> and <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H269>sister's<s%> <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me; that he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>man;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H5869>well.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Come <S%H935>in,<s%> thou <S%H1288>blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> <S%H5975>standest<s%> thou <S%H2351>without?<s%> for <S%H595>I<s%> have <S%H6437>prepared<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4725>room<s%> for the <S%H1581>camels.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house:<s%> and he <S%H6605>ungirded<s%> his <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> and <S%H4554>provender<s%> for the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and the <S%H376>men's<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him.

And there was <S%H7760>set<s%> meat <S%H6440>before<s%> him to <S%H398>eat:<s%> but he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H518><s%> I have <S%H1696>told<s%> mine <S%H1697>errand.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Speak <S%H1696>on.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> and he is become <S%H1431>great:<s%> and he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and <S%H8198>maidservants,<s%> and <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and <S%H2543>asses.<s%>

And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> my <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> to my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H310>when<s%> she was <S%H2209>old:<s%> and unto him hath he <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath.

And my <S%H113>master<s%> made me <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to my <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> in <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> dwell: <S%H3427><s%>

But <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> thou shalt <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H4940>kindred,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> unto my <S%H1121>son.<s%>
And I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H194>Peradventure<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1980>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> me.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, The <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H1980>walk,<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> his <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee, and <S%H6743>prosper<s%> thy <S%H1870>way;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for my <S%H1121>son<s%> of my <S%H4480>kindred,<s%> <S%H4940><s%> and of my father's <S%H4480>house:<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H1><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shalt thou be <S%H5352>clear<s%> from this my <S%H4480>oath,<s%> <S%H423><s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thou <S%H935>comest<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H4940>kindred;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> thee one, thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5355>clear<s%> from my <S%H4480>oath.<s%> <S%H423><s%>

And I <S%H935>came<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5869>well,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> thou <S%H3426>do<s%> <S%H6743>prosper<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> go: <S%H1980><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H5324>stand<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5869>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water;<s%> and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that when the <S%H5959>virgin<s%> cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> water, and I <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her, Give me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of thy <S%H4480>pitcher<s%> <S%H3537><s%> to <S%H8248>drink;<s%>
